data.title: Bambi and the Great Prince of the Forest
data.overview: Taking place between Bambi's mother's death and Bambi shown as a young adult buck, the film follows Bambi's relationship with his father, The Great Prince of the Forest, and Bambi's efforts to earn his father's love for him.

data.title: Bambi
data.overview: Bambi's tale unfolds from season to season as the young prince of the forest learns about life, love, and friends.
